verbose_text: Of note, Suetsuna and Saito reported that PYP inhibits antimutagenesis and Ca 2+ precipitation, lowers plasma and hepatic cholesterol, improves hepatic function, reduces blood sugar and exhibits antioxidant and SOD like qualities; PYP also has angiotensin-converting-enzyme (ACE) inhibitory and anti-hypertensive effects.
evidence: PYP inhibits antimutagenesis and Ca 2+  precipitation, lowers plasma and hepatic cholesterol, improves hepatic function, reduces blood sugar
